Comments: run this command only once to generate a package.json file to begin a project: npm init -f
package.json is the configuring file used by npm and only npm
npm will not only install dependencies but update the package.json
each time npm install <library> is runed
DevDependencies are installed for typescript to check on the code for errors,
this is why it is utilised during development but not during production
in fact npm ci (check Dockerfile) won't install devDependencies while npm install will
name: game-service
